objects.specification: A smooth uniform floor plane with a slightly darker neutral hue to contrast the walls, featuring a matte finish and a subtle fine-grained texture reminiscent of polished wood or vinyl planks. The edges are crisp and square, providing a seamless boundary, ideal for a modern classroom setting.

A large planar wall panel with a smooth surface and gently rounded corners, finished in a light neutral matte paint for a clean modern classroom aesthetic. The thickness is consistent with minimal bevel, providing structural integrity and a uniform appearance.

A large planar wall panel with a smooth surface and gently rounded corners, finished in a light neutral matte paint for a clean modern classroom aesthetic. The thickness is consistent with minimal bevel, providing structural integrity and a uniform appearance.

A large planar wall panel with a smooth surface and gently rounded corners, finished in a light neutral matte paint for a clean modern classroom aesthetic. The thickness is consistent with minimal bevel, providing structural integrity and a uniform appearance.

A single-panel interior door with a sleek flush surface and minimalist handle, finished in the same neutral tone as the walls. The door features subtle beveling around the frame and a slim profile for unobtrusive integration into the classroom environment.

A rectangular teacher's desk crafted from a rich dark wood tone with a polished finish, featuring sturdy square legs and slightly rounded top edges. It has generous proportions to provide ample workspace and a professional look, with subtle detailing at corners for realism.

An ergonomic swivel chair upholstered in a dark complementary fabric, featuring a high backrest, cushioned seat, and armrests, supported by a metal five-star base with caster wheels. The chair emphasizes comfort and professional appearance.

A large rectangular whiteboard with a glossy white writing surface framed by a thin aluminum border. The surface balances matte and gloss to minimize glare and is easy to clean, providing a modern and functional teaching tool.

A compact student desk with a warm wood tone tabletop, smooth varnished finish, and gently rounded edges, supported by slender metal legs painted to complement the wood. The design is simple, functional and durable for everyday classroom use.

A student chair with a molded seat and backrest in a complementary muted color, featuring a slight ergonomic curvature, supported by four slender metal legs with a matte finish. The design is sturdy, lightweight, and ideal for classroom seating.

A tall five-shelf bookshelf crafted from warm wood tone matching the student desks, with open-backed shelving filled with books of varying sizes and colors. Each shelf has a slight front lip to secure items, and the vertical panels and base provide sturdy support.

A large rectangular window with a clean white frame and clear glass panes evenly divided, featuring a minimalist sill. The frame has subtle beveling that catches light realistically, creating a bright and open feel.

Heavyweight fabric curtains in a complementary muted tone, hanging from a discreet rod above the window frame with natural gentle folds. The material has a subtle woven texture and the panels overlap slightly for a realistic drape.

An educational poster printed on semi-gloss paper with vibrant colors and detailed diagrams. It is affixed flat against the wall with a barely visible transparent border, offering a realistic printed material look appropriate for classroom decoration.

An educational poster printed on semi-gloss paper with vibrant colors and detailed diagrams. It is affixed flat against the wall with a barely visible transparent border, offering a realistic printed material look appropriate for classroom decoration.

A larger chart board printed on semi-gloss material with clear educational charts and labels, framed by a thin transparent border. It is mounted flush to the wall, providing an informative visual display suitable for a learning environment.

A round analog wall clock with a crisp white face, bold black numerals, slender black hands, and a thin black bezel. The clock face is protected by slightly reflective glass, creating a classic and easily readable design.

A potted indoor plant with lush broad green leaves showing subtle vein texture, housed in a simple ceramic pot with a muted neutral glaze and slight sheen. The leaves spread naturally for a lifelike appearance, adding a touch of greenery.
A small cylindrical waste bin made of durable plastic in muted gray, featuring a slightly flared rim and smooth matte finish. The simple design is sturdy and functional for classroom waste disposal.

A modern square flush-mounted ceiling light fixture with a white translucent diffuser and thin white metal frame, emitting soft and evenly distributed light. The minimalist design is unobtrusive and blends seamlessly with the ceiling.
